head.title: A Shorthand Guide To Change in Taxes

hedline.hl1: A Shorthand Guide To Change in Taxes

abstract.p: Correction of picture credits with cover article of Television section July 23 about Lifetime series, Strong Medicine

block.p: Partisan battles are being waged in Washington over tax cuts for married couples. The Republicans have pushed through a bill that would cut taxes by $292 billion over 10 years, but President Clinton has vowed to veto it, saying it is too costly. The parties are also skirmishing over estate tax and retirement savings plans. An analysis of the legislation and how it would affect families of different income levels.
